Verses: 1 pinbu, Avar Pattanangaldhorum Giraamangal Thorum Pirayaanampanni, Dhevanudaiya Raajyaththirkuriya Narseydhiyaik Koorip Pirasangiththuvandhaar. Panniruvarum Avarudanekooda Irundhaargal.
2 avar Pollaadha Aavigalaiyum Viyaadhigalaiyum Neekkik Gunamaakkina Sila Sthireegalum, Ezhu Pisaasugal Neengina Magadhalenaal Ennappatta Mariyaalum,
3 erodhin Kaariyakkaaranaana Koosaavin Manaiviyaagiya Yovannaalum, Soosannaalum, Thangal Aasthigalaal Avarukku Oozhiyanjeydhukonduvandha Matra Anegam Sthireekalum Avarudane Irundhaargal.
4 sagala Pattanangalilumirundhu Thiralaana Janangal Avaridaththil Vandhu Koodinapodhu, Avar Uvamaiyaagach Sonnadhu:
5 vidhaikkiravan Oruvan Vidhaiyai Vidhaikkap Purappattaan; Avan Vidhaikkaiyil Sila Vidhai Vazhiyaruge Vizhundhu Midhiyundadhu, Aagaayaththupparavaigal Vandhu Adhaip Patchiththuppottadhu.
6 sila Vidhai Karpaaraiyinmel Vizhundhadhu; Adhu Mulaiththapin Adharku Eeramillaadhadhinaal Ularndhupoyitru.
7 sila Vidhai Mullulla Idangalil Vizhundhadhu; Mul Kooda Valarndhu, Adhai Nerukkippottadhu.
8 sila Vidhai Nalla Nilaththil Vizhundhadhu, Adhu Mulaiththu, Ondru Nooraagap Balan Koduththadhu Endraar. Ivaigalaich Solli, Ketkiradharkuk Kaadhullavan Ketkakkadavan Endru Saththamittuk Koorinaar.
9 appozhudhu Avarudaiya Seeshargal, Indha Uvamaiyin Karuththu Ennavendru Avaridaththil Kettaargal.

10 adharku Avar: Dhevanudaiya Raajyaththin Ragasiyangalai Ariyumpadi Ungalukku Arulappattadhu; Matravargalukko, Avargal Kandum Kaanaadhavargalaagavum, Kettum Unaraadhavargalaagavum Irukkaththakkadhaaga, Avaigal Uvamaigalaagach Sollappadugiradhu.
11 andha Uvamaiyin Karuththaavadhu: Vidhai Dhevanudaiya Vasanam.

12 vazhiyaruge Vidhaikkappattavargal Vasanaththaik Ketkiravargalaayirukkiraargal; Avargal Visuvaasiththu Ratchikkappadaadhapadikkup Pisaasaanavan Vandhu, Avvasanaththai Avargal Irudhayaththilirundhu Eduththuppodugiraan.

13 karpaaraiyinmel Vidhaikkappattavargal Ketkumpodhu Sandhoshaththudane Vasanaththai Etrukkollukiraargal; Aayinum Thangalukkulle Verkollaadhapadiyinaale, Konjakkaalamaaththiram Visuvaasiththu, Sodhanaikaalaththil Pinvaangippogiraargal.

14 mullulla Idangalil Vidhaikkappattavargal Vasanaththaik Ketkiravargalaayirukkiraargal; Kettavudane Poi, Pirabanjaththirkuriya Kavalaigalinaalum Aisuvariyaththinaalum Sitrinbangalinaalum Nerukkappattu, Balankodaadhirukkiraargal.
15 nalla Nilaththil Vidhaikkappattavargal Vasanaththaik Kettu, Adhai Unmaiyum Nanmaiyumaana Irudhayaththile Kaaththup Porumaiyudane Balan Kodukkiravargalaayirukkiraargal.

16 oruvanum Vilakkaik Koluththi, Adhai Oru Paaththiraththinaale Moodavumaattaan, Kattilinkeezhe Vaikkavumaattaan; Ulle Piravesikkiravargal Adhin Velichchaththaik Kaanumpadikku Adhai Vilakkuththandinmel Vaippaan.
17 veliyarangamaagaadha Ragasiyamumillai, Ariyappattu Velikkuvaraadha Maraiporulumillai.

18 aadhalaal Neengal Ketkira Vidhaththaikkuriththuk Gavaniyungal; Ullavanevano Avanukkuk Kodukkappadum; Illaadhavanevano Avan Thanakkundendru Ninaikkiradhum Avanidaththilirundhu Eduththukkollappadum Endraar.
19 appozhudhu Avarudaiya Thaayaarum Sagodhararum Avaridaththil Vandhaargal; Janakkoottaththinaale Avarandaiyil Avargal Serakkoodaadhirundhadhu.
20 appozhudhu: Ummudaiya Thaayaarum Ummudaiya Sagodhararum Ummaip Paarkkavendumendru Veliye Nirkiraargal Endru Avarukku Ariviththaargal.
21 adharku Avar: Dhevanudaiya Vasanaththaik Kettu, Adhinpadi Seygiravargale Enakkuth Thaayum Enakkuch Sagodhararumaayirukkiraargal Endraar.
22 pinbu Orunaal Avar Thamadhu Seesharodungoodap Padavil Eri: Kadalin Akkaraikkup Povom Vaarungal Endraar; Appadiye Purappattup Ponaargal.
23 padavu Odugaiyil Avar Niththiraiyaayirundhaar. Appozhudhu Kadalile Suzhalkaatrundaanadhaal, Avargal Mosamadaiyaththakkadhaaip Padavu Jalaththinaal Niraindhadhu.

24 avargal Avaridaththil Vandhu, Aiyare, Aiyare, Madindhupogirom Endru Avarai Ezhuppinaargal; Avar Ezhundhu, Kaatraiyum Jalaththin Kondhalippaiyum Adhattinaar; Udane Avaigal Nindrupoi, Amaidhalundaayitru.

25 avar Avargalai Nokki: Ungal Visuvaasam Enge Endraar. Avargal Payandhu Aachchariyappattu: Ivar Yaaro, Kaatrukkum Jalaththukkum Kattalaiyidugiraar, Avaigalum Ivarukkuk Keezhppadigiradhe Endru Oruvarodoruvar Sollikkondaargal.
26 pinbu Galileyaavukku Edhiraana Kadharenarudaiya Naattil Serndhaargal.

27 avar Karaiyiliranginapodhu, Nedunaalaaip Pisaasugal Pidiththavanum Vasthirandhariyaadhavanum, Veettil Thangaamal Piredhak Kallaraigalile Thanginavanumaayirundha Andhap Pattanaththu Manushan Oruvan Avarukku Edhiraaga Vandhaan.

28 avan Yesuvaik Kandapodhu Kookkuralittu, Avarukku Munbaagavizhundhu: Yesuve, Unnadhamaana Dhevanudaiya Kumaarane, Enakkum Umakkum Enna? Ennai Vedhanaippaduththaadhapadikku Ummai Vendikkollugiren Endru Magaa Saththaththode Sonnaan.

29 andha Asuththa Aavi Avanai Vittuppogumpadi Yesu Kattalaiyittapadiyinaale Appadich Sonnaan. Andha Asuththa Aavi Vegukaalamaai Avanaip Pidiththirundhadhu; Avan Sangiligalinaalum Vilangugalinaalum Kattundu Kaavalpannappattirundhum Kattugalai Muriththuppottup Pisaasinaal Vanaandharangalukkuth Thuraththappattirundhaan.
30 yesu Avanai Nokki: Un Per Ennavendru Kettaar; Adharku Avan: Legiyon Endraan; Anegam Pisaasugal Avanukkul Pugundhirundhapadiyaal Andhap Peraich Sonnaan.
31 thangalaip Paadhaalaththile Pogak Kattalaiyidaadhapadikku Avaigal Avarai Vendikkondana.

32 avvidaththil Anegam Pandrigal Koottamaai Malaiyile Meyndhukondirundhadhu. Andhap Pandrigalukkulle Pogumpadi Thangalukku Uththaravukodukkavendum Endru Avarai Vendikkondana; Avaigalukku Uththaravukoduththaar.
33 appadiye Pisaasugal Andha Manushanai Vittu Neengi, Pandrigalukkul Pugundhana; Appozhudhu Andhap Pandrikkoottam Uyarndha Mettilirundhu Kadalile Paaindhu, Amizhndhu, Maandadhu.
34 avaigalai Meyththavargal Sambaviththadhaik Kandu, Odippoi, Pattanaththilum Sutruppurangalilum Ariviththaargal.

35 appozhudhu, Sambaviththadhaip Paarkkumpadi Janangal Purappattu, Yesuvinidaththil Vandhu, Pisaasugal Vittuppona Manushan Vasthirandhariththu Yesuvin Paadhaththaruge Utkaarndhu Puththidhelindhirukkiradhaik Kandu, Payandhaargal.
36 pisaasugal Pidiththirundhavan Sosthamaakkappattadhaik Kandavargalum Adhai Avargalukku Ariviththaargal.

37 appozhudhu Kadharenarudaiya Sutruppuraththilulla Thiralaana Janangalellaarum Migavum Payamadaindhapadiyinaale, Thangalai Vittup Pogumpadi Avarai Vendikkondaargal. Andhappadi Avar Padavil Eri, Thirumpipponaar.
38 pisaasugal Neengina Manushan Avarudane Kooda Irukkumpadi Uththaravu Kettaan.

39 yesu Avanai Nokki: Nee Un Veettukkuth Thirumpippoi, Dhevan Unakkuch Seydhavaigalaiyellaam Arivi Endru Solli, Avanai Anuppivittaar. Andhappadi Avan Poi, Yesu Thanakkuch Seydhavaigalaiyellaam Pattanaththil Engum Pirasiththappatuththinaan.
40 yesu Thirumbi Vandhapodhu, Janangalellaarum Avarukkaagak Kaaththirundhapadiyaal Avaraich Sandhoshamaai Etrukkondaargal.
41 appozhudhu Jebaaalayaththalaivanaagiya Yaveeru Ennum Perulla Oruvan Vandhu, Yesuvin Paadhaththil Vizhundhu Pannirandu Vayadhulla Thannudaiya Ore Kumaaraththi Marana Avasthaiyaayirundhapadiyaal,
42 than Veettirku Varumpadi Avarai Vendikkondaan. Avar Pogaiyil Thiralaana Janangal Avarai Nerukkinaargal.
43 appozhudhu Pannirandu Varushamaaip Perumpaadullavalaayirundhu, Than Aasthigalaiyellaam Vaiththiyargalukkuch Selavazhiththum, Oruvanaalum Sosthamaakkappadaadhirundha Oru Sthiree,
44 avarukkup Pinnaaga Vandhu, Avarudaiya Vasthiraththin Oraththaith Thottaal; Udane Avaludaiya Perumpaadu Nindrupoyitru.

45 appozhudhu Yesu: Ennaith Thottadhu Yaar Endru Kettaar. Engalukkuth Theriyaadhendru Ellaarum Sonnapodhu, Pedhuruvum Avanudane Kooda Irundhavargalum: Aiyare, Thiralaana Janangal Ummaich Soozhndhu Nerukkikkondirukkiraargale, Ennaith Thottadhu Yaar Endru Eppadik Ketkireer Endraargal.
46 adharku Yesu: Ennilirundhu Vallamai Purappattadhai Arindhirukkiren; Aadhalaal Oruvar Ennaith Thottadhundu Endraar.

47 appozhudhu Andha Sthiree Thaan Maraindhirukkavillaiyendru Kandu, Nadungivandhu, Avar Munbaaka Vizhundhu, Thaan Avaraith Thottakaaranaththaiyum Udane Thaan Sosthamaanadhaiyum Ellaa Janangalukkum Munbaaka Avarukku Ariviththaal.
48 avar Avalaip Paarththu: Magale, Thidankol, Un Visuvaasam Unnai Ratchiththadhu, Samaadhaanaththode Po Endraar.
49 avar Ippadip Pesikkondirukkaiyil, Jebaaalayaththalaivanudaiya Veettilirundhu Oruvan Vandhu, Avanai Nokki: Ummudaiya Kumaaraththi Mariththupponaal, Podhagarai Varuththappaduththa Vendaam Endraan.
50 yesu Adhaik Kettu: Payappadaadhe; Visuvaasamullavanaayiru, Appozhudhu Aval Ratchikkappaduvaal Endraar.
51 avar Veettil Vandhapodhu, Pedhuruvaiyum Yaakkobaiyum Yovaanaiyum Pennin Thagappanaiyum Thaayaiyum Thavira Veroruvaraiyum Ulle Varavottaamal,
52 ellaarum Azhudhu Avalaikkuriththuth Thukkangondaadugiradhaik Kandu: Azhaadheyungal, Aval Mariththuppogavillai, Niththiraiyaayirukkiraal Endraar.
53 aval Mariththupponaalendru Avargal Arindhadhinaal, Avaraip Paarththu Nagaiththaargal.
54 ellaaraiyum Avar Veliye Pogappanni, Avaludaiya Kaiyaippidiththu: Pillaiye Ezhundhiru Endraar.
55 appozhudhu Aval Uyir Thirumba Vandhadhu, Udane Aval Ezhundhirundhaal; Avalukku Aagaarangodukkak Kattalaiyittaar.
56 aval Thaaithagappanmaar Aachchariyappattaargal. Appozhudhu Nadandhadhai Oruvarukkum Sollaamalirukkumpadi Avargalukkuk Kattalaiyittaar.
